turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order some coffee from the Starbucks that's in Studio City in California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want I actually want two, so I want one iced and one hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. did you want any milk in those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want in the hot one, just put regular milk. In the cold one, don't put any milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all for today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so u said 2 grande americanos, one iced with no milk and one hot with whole milk from starbucks in studio city.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $8.40 is your total. should i place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Place it for me right now. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, the drinks will be ready in 9 minutes. I've sent your receipt to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you. That's it for today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need my help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, enjoy those drinks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
